Summary: PowerShell script to generate a report of unattached VHD disks. This script will create two files - unattached_managed_disks.csv, unattached_un_managed_disks.csvThese two files will contain details about VHD files that are not attached to an Azure virtual machine.NOTE: You have t
Title: Generate report for unattached Azure disks (managed and un-managed)
